Title: Grozing Pliers
Description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1. (1 may not change to 6, or 6 to 1)

Title: Englomise Brush
Description: Move any one die in your winodow ignoring the color restrictions. (You must obey all other placement restrictions)

Title: Copper Foil Burnisher
Description: Move any one die in your winodow ignoring shade restrictions. (You must obey all other placement restrictions)

Title: Lathekin
Description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions

Title: Lens Cutter
Description: After drafting, swap the drafted die with a die from the Round Track

Title: Flux Brush
Description: After drafting, re-roll the drafted die. (If it cannot be placed, return in to the Draft Pool)

Title: Glazing Hammer
Description: Re-roll all dice in the Draft Pool. (This may only be used on your second turn before drafting)

Title: Running Pliers
Description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die. (Skip your next turn this round)

Title: Cork-backed Straightedge
Description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die. (You must obey all other placement restriction)

Title: Grinding Stone
Description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side. (6 flips to 1, 5 to 2, 4 to 3, etc.)

Title: Flux Remover
Description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull 1 die from the bag. (Choose a value and place the new die obeying all placement restrictions, or return it to the Draft Pool)

Title: Tap Wheel
Description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. (You must obey all placement restrictions)
